desprendete.title: Let Loose
desprendete.description: Spin the wheel and complete the dares or answer the truths.
desprendete.needTwoPlayers: You need at least 2 players to start.
desprendete.rulesContent: Each player spins the wheel. If it lands on TRUTH, they must answer the question; if it lands on DARE, they must complete the challenge. The goal is to have fun, loosen up, and be bold!

INSTRUCTIONS.TITLE: How to Play - Kiss Roulette
INSTRUCTIONS.STEP1_DESC: Add at least 2 players with their names and genders
INSTRUCTIONS.STEP2_DESC: Select kiss duration and whether to include intimate parts
INSTRUCTIONS.STEP3_DESC: Each player spins to discover which body part to kiss and who to kiss
INSTRUCTIONS.STEP4_DESC: Press 'Start Kiss' and perform the action for the selected time
INSTRUCTIONS.STEP5_DESC: Continue with the next player and repeat the fun
INSTRUCTIONS.TIP1: All participants must agree with the rules
INSTRUCTIONS.TIP2: You can skip intimate parts if you prefer a softer game
INSTRUCTIONS.TIP4: Have fun and create memorable moments!

COUNTDOWN.COUNTDOWN_LABEL: The kiss ends when it reaches zero!
